content:
There are no enemy ships in the Black and Azov Seas of the Russian Fleet.

About thisreportedNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

There are 2 enemy ships in the Mediterranean, including one carpet carrier carpet, a total volley of up to 8 missiles.

In the interests of the Russian Federation, 17 vessels passed the Kerch Strait during the day, 4 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;

20 vessels were passed to the Black Sea, 7 of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait.

"The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (SOLAS), turning off automatic identification systems (AIS)," the Navy said.
title: There are no enemy ships in the Black and Azov Seas
description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Mediterranean are 2 ...
author: Army Inform
